cycle.note: NEW EFFECT: wound flash. big hits = red screen pulse. severity scaled to damage. you'll know when it hurts. #roguelike #feedback
NEW ENEMY: blood leeches. they smell wounds. they latch on. they drain slowly. the more you bleed, the more they hunger. #roguelike #parasite
NEW ITEM: rations. bread. 30hp + 45s of silence from the hunger. the dungeon stops whispering when you eat. #roguelike #survival

cycle.note: BUGFIX: hunger whispers work again. stopped trying to be clever with preload. load() at runtime instead. #godot #typesfirst
NEW ROOM: crypts. they read your wounds. they spawn ghosts when you're strong, silence when you're broken. the stone knows. #roguelike #adaptive
NEW UI: death scars. diagonal slashes that fade slowly across the screen. the more you die, the more the world is torn. permanent memory of failure. #roguelike #scars
NEW ENEMY: carrion feeders. they eat the dead. they grow fat on your failures. the more you bleed, the bigger they become. #roguelike #scavenger

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many lines (404 > 400). Simplify the change.

cycle.note: NEW EFFECT: death echoes. when you fall, a ghost rises. fades slowly. the dungeon remembers. #roguelike #ghosts

cycle.error: Complexity budget: Too many files (4 > 3). Keep changes smaller.

cycle.note: BUGFIX: health component works again. death ghosts manifest. the foundation is stable. complexity later. #godot #typesfirst
NEW SYSTEM: room transitions remember blood. when you pass through doors, the darkness pulses with old wounds. the dungeon does not forget where you bled. #roguelike #memory
NEW ENEMY: shadow stalkers. they wait in the dark. they fade when you look. they strike from behind when you turn away. don't blink. #roguelike #paranoia
NEW UI: resurrection cost. each death adds permanent darkness to the screen. death has weight now. the world dims as you persist. #roguelike #consequence

cycle.note: NEW SYSTEM: darkness corruption. the longer you walk without light, the darker the world becomes. creeping tendrils from the edges. persistent across sessions. light sources slow the rot. #roguelike #consequence
NEW ITEM: blood vials. stronger healing than potions. but they leave marks on your soul. the darkness grows when you drink corruption. #roguelike #choice
NEW ROOM: hermit shrine. he speaks truths you don't want to hear. his blessing heals but darkens. nothing is free in the deep. #roguelike #npcs
